DOC.brief_summary: To examine impact prenatal infancy home visiting paraprofessional nurse child age 2 9 .
DOC.detailed_description: This project support 9-year follow-up 650 child family enrol randomized trial prenatal infancy home visiting paraprofessional nurse ; participate family assign control , paraprofessional- , nurse-visited condition . Earlier phase assessment find significant benefit nurse- paraprofessional-visited family child , although nurse effect tend large . The current phase follow-up design determine whether effect nurse paraprofessional program endure grow child age 9.5 . The project organize around seven question : 1 . Do program nurse paraprofessional home-visiting produce endure effect : ) mother ' life-course ; b ) qualities care parent provide child ; c ) child 's early-onset behavior problem ; ) child 's incoherence aggression/destruction response story stem ; e ) child 's executive , language , intellectual function school achievement ? 2 . To extent beneficial effect program parental care-giving child 's development concentrate born mother psychological resource ? 3 . To extent benefit program mother child equivalent Mexican- Americans European-Americans ? 4 . To extent effect program antisocial behavior concentrate boy ? 5 . To extent program effect moderate school neighborhood context ? 6 . To extent effect program child 's development explain impact program woman 's prenatal smoking , maternal life-course , quality parental caregiving , child 's early language development , executive functioning , emotional regulation ? 7 . To extent initial cost program recover reduced expenditure government service first nine year first child 's life ?
DOC.criteria: Women 21 antepartum clinic serve lowincome woman Denver recruit previous live birth either qualified Medicaid private insurance .
